#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<climits>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ll t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        ll t=n,s=LONG_LONG_MAX,rem;
        while(s>24)
        {
            s=0;
            while(t!=0)
            {
                rem=t%10;
                s+=rem;
                t=t/10;
            }
            if(s>24)
                t=s;
        }
        if(n>24)
            cout<<s<<endl;
        else
        cout<<n<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
